DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized, controlled trial to test the use of an educational video during the newborn well-child visit. Parents who watch the video during their medical visit will be compared to those parents who receive traditional paper handouts. Measures obtained at baseline and 2-week follow-up include knowledge of infant development, self-efficacy with infant care, and problem-solving skills.
DOC.criteria: Baby's first visit to the pediatric office Baby > 1 month old Parent/Caregiver < 18yrs old Inability to understand English No access to a working telephone
